marklogic.body: ย ย ย ย ย ย ย ย ย ย ย ย ย ย ย ย ย ย ย ย ย ย ย ย ย ย ย ย ย ย ย ย ย ย ย ย ย ย ย MUTINOUS -- BARKING AT THE MOON Thank goodness for the poster called Edward. This person recognized the twin sides of hundreds of canine owners, in trying to conceal individualย Anxiety,ย while suffering from paranoid inclinations, that harbor split personalities, bordering upon self-induced masochism of repressive Oedipus encircling infantile thought.Dr. Sigmund Freud surmised these types of personalities as suffering with theย ( Personality Suppressionย ย Complex Syndrome ). This clever master of unraveling disassociated minds, and their subconscious willingness to conceal pent up erotic inhibitions, that exceptional racket was the driving force behind a more arising psychiatric classification, as the ( Personality Suppression Gravitational Complex Syndrome). Mr.Edwards was on to something in discerning that possibly a variation of specific personality traits. Masochism has become a religion with hundreds of canine loversย across America. The late Emily Zola, one of France's eighteen hundreds authoritative writers on canines, used Freudian concepts in declaring that too much mutt consoling would possibility lead into a mental disorder termed ( Ineluctable Determinism ). This is an individual pre-neurological mental disorder, that requires self-torture through elevated masochism, or a perpetual monologueย [ย deified ego ], in enjoying the Comfort of barking dogs. Here we have psychotic manifestationsof an inhibited class, in attempting to impose, transpose , disturbed personality traits into mutts. that cannotcomprehend that their so-called [ master [ might be a raving lunatic in need of mental hygiene
